review: The doctor is really helpful and make sure you understand the process involved. Excellent in advising the best possible solution to your problem. Tooth extraction hand is also great.

she is very experienced doctor..was able to quickly tell me the condition of my teeth *** **** ***** ** *** **** **********She removed damaged portion of my tooth and I dint feel any such pain.now doing RCT here and visiting her regularly... everything going very good without any pain or issue .I would recommend her to everyone.

Dr. Bose was excellent in making me feel comfortable and provided me all the information to make a choice about my teeth.
Her handling of equipment was also as smooth and painless as possible.
She explained the medication and post process do's and don'ts in an excellent manner, making me feel equipped to handle my situation.

Overall, definitely a pleasant experience.

Consulted Dr Anuradha for my husband ... She explained us the issue clearly and she followed incremental approach in addressing the problem.. She patiently listens to issues.. Would highly recommend her for her expertise
Doctor really helped me ease into the entire procedure. I highly recommend her and her team. Thanks again!
It was a good experience..We had to wait 15 mins extra as doctor was a bit late but overall it was good experience. The clinic was clean and proper covid norms was followed.
